java_home_description: Specifies the folder path to the Java 8 runtime used to launch the Apex Language Server (for example, /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.8.0_131.jdk/Contents/Home).
apex_rename_description: Enable Apex rename capabilities, currently in beta. This feature flag is exclusive for VSCode; feature is auto-enabled in VSCode Insiders.
apex_semantic_errors_description: Enable Apex LSP to surface semantic errors, currently in beta.
